page.title: 06Shooting
page.content: One of my favourite hobbies is shooting. I have a 20 bore shotgun and my father has always been careful with guns. My shotgun cost about Â£328 and with that price the man gave me a cleaning kit and a cover for the gun, and also a box of cartridges which are Â£3.00 for 25. I find that people that brag aren't usually very good at shooting. Sometimes I wait in my hide (A hide is a small space of ground where you are camouflaged and you can see the birds but they can't see you) for hours upon end and I don't get discouraged at all. I say better luck next time. A good hide need be no expense at all. All it takes is a bit of time. I shoot at my grandma's where it overlooks the river. I find that clay pigeon shoting is more fun than actually shooting birds. You need a machine to fire the clay pigeons from.
